item.title: Commands
item.description: hit’s goals is to be as simple and straight-forward to use as possible. And in that spirit the number of command that hit supports is fairly small. For hitting HTTP requests, the core hit command should be sufficient most of the time. For other situations, there are a few other commands available: version # Output the version of the hit command. For example: $ hit version v0.1.0 (commit: f563300)
